author: fab_10
content: Unable to build prysm-beacon-node image using the eip4844-interop repo, see https://github.com/Inphi/eip4844-interop/issues/91

author: inphi
content:
I'll take a look later. Let me know if you can run prysm using this image `ethpandaops/prysm:eip4844-1-67ba2c4`:
```diff
diff --git a/docker-compose.yml b/docker-compose.yml
index ca33f51..011a682 100644
--- a/docker-compose.yml
+++ b/docker-compose.yml
@@ -59,9 +59,7 @@ x-prysm-beacon-node: &prysm-bn
       condition: service_started
     genesis-generator:
       condition: service_completed_successfully
-  build:
-    context: ./prysm
-    dockerfile: Dockerfile.prysm
+  image: ethpandaops/prysm:eip4844-1-67ba2c4
   healthcheck:
     test: ["CMD", "curl", "--fail", "localhost:3500/eth/v1/node/health"]
     interval: 2s
@@ -232,9 +230,7 @@ services:
         condition: service_started
       genesis-generator:
         condition: service_completed_successfully
-    build:
-      context: ./prysm
-      dockerfile: Dockerfile.prysm
+    image: ethpandaops/prysm:eip4844-1-67ba2c4
     command: >
       validator
       --accept-terms-of-use
```

author: fab_10
content: yes it works, but just found that the issue is local to me, and due to a bad interaction between company security suite and docker, so just ignore it
